author: tmiychao
content: Please let's discuss this DMs, send me more details on what would you need and I'll see if I can provide

author: tmiychao
content:
Next week is the last regular week of the cohort. We will have regular standup on Monday so you can give quick updates about finishing touches of your project and final Office Hours on Wednesday. That will be our last online meeting before we meet in person in Argentina. 

Next week Office Hours will be the last chance to present your project and work during the cohort online. For everyone who worked on something and cannot come to present it to Devconnect, please sign up. I see couple of people, <@1277159728396374111> <@895733763433181194> <@1046652579737772122> <@913039163866120203> might be interested to present > https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-six/issues/512
